content.rendered:
this blog is all about Growth Business Learning
and stuff

People are capable of amazing things. I want to help as many people as I can to achieve their goals and feel fulfilled.

hi there!

My name is Michael Farber (get it? Far-Ber? Ok, I’ll stop now).
I’m a content creator from Israel who’s very passionate about personal growth, productivity hacks, and mental clarity. I also make websites, just like this one, and love creating animations.

The goal of this blog is to share everything I’ve learned about productivity & business, strengthening self-confidence, and improving your well being.

If that’s something you’re interested in, this blog is the right place for you.

Values

My Core Values

1

Be Kind

Kindness is contagious.
It makes the people receiving it happier, but also the ones who act on it.

2

Have Fun

Life can be stressful sometimes. It’s important to find the time to have a laugh and do something you love.

3

Make an impact

Everything feels more fulfilling when you’re doing it for someone else. Even the smallest of things can have a huge impact.

Blog

Things I Wrote

Is Your Perfectionism Holding You Back?

What Do You Want to Be When You Grow-Up?

How to Reach 25 Goals in Under a Year

5 Things Porn Teaches About Entrepreneurship

Show Me More

YouTube

YouTube

i'm working on it...

Play
Play
Play
Play
Play
